original_text: With the dough the Israelites had brought from Egypt, they baked loaves of unleavened bread. The dough was without yeast because they had been driven out of Egypt and did not have time to prepare food for themselves.
korean_text: 그들이 애굽으로부터 가지고 나온 발교되지 못한 반죽으로 무교병을 구웠으니 이는 그들이 애굽에서 쫓겨나므로 지체할 수 없었음이며 아무 양식도 준비하지 못하였음이었더라

sentences.original_text: With the dough the Israelites had brought from Egypt
they baked loaves of unleavened bread
because they had been driven out of Egypt
